## Overview

Weekly butterfly transect surveys follow standardized UK Butterfly Monitoring Scheme protocols to monitor butterfly populations in the Nature Discovery Garden.

## Objectives

- Monitor butterfly species diversity and abundance
- Track population trends over time
- Assess the effectiveness of habitat management
- Contribute to national butterfly monitoring efforts
